CustomField.description: If it is checked, then will be shown in the list of Salesforce Orgs with status as connected/disconnected in Salesforce to Salesforce Integration LWC
CustomField.inlineHelpText: If it is checked, then will be shown in the list of Salesforce Orgs with status as connected/disconnected in Salesforce to Salesforce Integration LWC
CustomField.label: Active
